summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 187 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 904 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 186.6m lower than yesterday, 27.5m lower than the past week, 904.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 745m to a maximum of 3580m, averaging 1799.8m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 1827.3m and 2700m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: The clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, pleasant humidity levels. Some rain can be expected, the clouds will be high, plenty of sunshine is expected, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. Weather could become unsettled.
